name: Website for the Spatial Intelligence Lab(SIL) of the WWU Münster
desc: Design and development of Wordpress based landing pages for Spatial Intelligence Lab(SIL) at the Institute for Geoinformatics.

name: PVP-Map
desc: Development of a web-based platform for the presentation of interactive maps for the planning, evaluation and development of the practical semester of student teachers at NRW universities.
customer: Ministry for School and Education of the State of NRW and 52°north

name: 3-2-1 heiss!
desc: Citizen Science project to detect heat islands in the canton of Aargau using a mobile senseBox in an individual housing with active ventilation.

name: CS:iDrop
desc: What happens to our tap water on its way from the house transfer station to the water tap? Do pipes and fittings influence individual water quality parameters? And if so, how great is the extent of this influence? These and other questions concerning the 'last meter' of our drinking water are investigated by citizens of the pilot region Bochum and scientists of the Ruhr-University Bochum in the project 'CS:iDrop - Citizen Science: investigation of Drinking-water of and by the public'. Reedu accompanies this project by developing the necessary smartphone application.

name: re:quest
desc: In the re:quest project, the teaching of programming and data skills takes place via digital Escape Games. Children, teenagers and young adults solve  puzzles and tasks of an Escape Game by programming and exploring and analyzing data.

name: mybadges
desc: myBadges is a system based on the Open Badge standard that can be used in school and non-school contexts. Badges are contextualised through an e-portfolio, documenting learning achievements, competence acquisition, successes and participation. As part of the #WirFürSchule 2020 hackathon, the project idea was further developed with an interdisciplinary team and a first prototype was implemented, which won first place. In the senseBox Pro project, this prototype will be docked onto the senseBox learning environment and the openSenseMap and, with the support of the Telekom Foundation, expanded and used in a pilot project in various educational institutions in Bonn.

name: Digtial-AG in the primary school
desc: In the open all-day programme of the Annette-von-Droste-Hülshoff Primary School Münster-Nienberge, we offer a weekly digital workshop for all children who enjoy using digital media and would like to take a look behind the scenes of their functions.
customer: Amt für Kinder, Jugendliche und Familien der Stadt Münster

name: App Development: Invasive species in Europe
desc: Further development of the app "Invasive species in Europe" to obtain and share information on invasive species in Europe.

name: Humboldt Explorers
desc: Development of a map-based web platform for the presentation and analysis of environmental data. Development of an individual senseBox for environmental data recording of the mobile student laboratory "Humboldt Explorers" of the Humboldt University Berlin.

name: openSenseMap
desc: Development, maintenance, improvement of the openSenseMap platform.

name: GeoGami
desc: Development of a mobile educational game to strengthen spatial awareness.

name: senseBox goes Futurium
desc: Integration of the senseBox in the exhibitions and events of the Futurium in Berlin. Hackathons, educational resources, an interaktiv exhibit, artsy data visualization and citizen workshops.

name: Landingpages for Bachelor and Master of Geoinformatics
desc: Design and development of Wordpress based landing pages for the Bachelor of Science Geoinformatics and Master of Science Geoinformatics degree programs.

name: Reflectories
desc: Development of the reflectories web application.

name: Biogas Database
desc: Development of a web application to analyse Biogasplants.
customer: FH Münster - University of Applied Sciences

name: Holiday-Workshops #DigitaleOstern #DigitalerHerbst
desc: Conception and implementation of holidy workshops for children of employees of the University of Münster aged 6-10 years on digital topics such as programming, Scratch, senseBox, Lego.

name: Climate Hackathon
desc: Conception and implementation of a digital hackathon on climate change, data visualization, art at the Goethe-Institut Glasgow. Equipping Goethe-Institutes with senseBoxes.

name: Turing Bus Workshops
desc: Conception and realization of several mobile senseBox workshops with the turing bus.

name: senseBox Space Hackathon
desc: Organization and realization of a two-day hackathon with tent camp for 50 children and teenagers (10-18 years) on the topic of "Space".

name: Handel-O-Mat
desc: In the Good News advertising column, you can click on the individual lines to change sentence parts and combine funny & effective plot ideas.

name: CodeWeek Workshops Berlin
desc: Conception and realization of six senseBox workshops within the CodeWeek in Berlin.

name: CodeWeek Workshops Bonn
desc: Conception and realization of senseBox workshops within the CodeWeek in Bonn.

name: Wetter.Wasser.Waterkant Workshops
desc: Conception and realization of senseBox workshops in the context of Wetter.Wasser.Waterkant Hamburg.

name: Classroom of the Future
desc: senseBox workshops as part of the Classroom of the Future at the Frankfurt Book Fair.

name: openSenseMap Feature-Layer
desc: Creation of ArcGIS feature layers with openSenseMap data. Besides static datasets, two layers are regularly updated with live openSenseMap data.

name: Indoor localization of hospital beds
desc: Prototype implementation of a system for indoor localization of hospital beds using radio transmitters.

name: TTN-Mapper for urban LoRa network
desc: Development of GPS LoRaWAN mappers to measure the reception strength of LoRaWAN signals.

name: Self-sufficient sensor network in Enschede
desc: Hardware for a LoRa sensor network with approx. 100 autonomous senseBox measuring stations for climate monitoring in Enschede.

name: senseBox Competition Hamburg
desc: Conception and implementation of the senseBox competition Hamburg, in which 10 schools were awarded for the implementation of innovative projects with a senseBox:edu class box. The participating teachers received an introduction to the senseBox in a workshop.

name: Klima findet Stadt
desc: Promotion of environmental education and open youth work in the STEM field in the Rhine-Sieg district with the core region of Bonn. Workshops in youth welfare institutions and secondary schools in the Rhine-Sieg district with the core region of Bonn.

name: Mobile environmental laboratory
desc: Development of a Bluetooth module for the senseBox:edu to connect to the phyphox app. Adaptations to the Blockly programming environment, development of teaching materials and test workshops in schools.

name: Hopp Events
desc: Conduct senseBox teacher training and events for computer science students.

name: senseBox Online Video Tutorials
desc: Production of online youtube video tutorials for the introduction to working with the senseBox.

name: LoRa Sensornetwork
desc: Open sensor network with 50 LoRa field stations equipped with climate and ground sensors.

name: LoRa-Netz Andernach
desc: Establishment of a LoRa network for the climate protection management department of the Andernach city administration.

name: STEM-Congress Workshop
desc: Citizen workshops on open source environmental sensing and IoT at STEM Days.

name: LoRa WAN SensorKit
desc: Development of firmware for a customized LoRaWAN device.

name: Smart City Dashboard
desc: Development od a Smart City Dashboard.

name: Story Map for international graduate students
desc: Develop a story map website to orient new international graduate students.

name: Digital Classroom
desc: Hackathon at the Annette-von-Droste-Hülshoff-Gymnasium Dülmen to mark the start of the "Digital Classroom".

name: webGIS.nrw
desc: Further development of a web-based geographic information system for the education sector
customer: Westfälische Wilhelms-Universität Münster Institut für Geoinformatik

name: Digital fair JurStart
desc: Development and implementation of a digital fair for law graduates

name: welt.weit.virtuell - Global learning with digital media
desc: Development of the map-based storytelling platform mapstories and use in real labs

name: KlimaDatenSchule
desc: Development of a web app and consulting for BildungsCent e.V. and mediale pfade - Verein für Medienbildung e.V.
customer: BildungsCent e.V., mediale pfade – Verein für Medienbildung e.V.

name: senseBox:bike - Futurium
desc: Development of a mobile senseBox for bicycles, video tutorials, makeathons and events and an exhibit.
